titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the appointment of an additional Assistant Chief Medical Director position in the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans' Administration to be designated as Medical Inspector General.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions relating to the organization of the Veterans Administration's Department of Medicine and Surgery to authorize the appointment of an additional Assistant Chief Medical Director, who shall be a qualifying physician and shall be designated as the Medical Inspector General, to perform such duties as assigned by the Chief Medical Director of such Department.
